Title: Morning Supplication
Arabic: اللهم بك أصبحنا وبك أمسينا وبك نحيا وبك نموت وإليك المصير
Transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna, wa bika amsaina, wa bika nahya, wa bika namoot, wa ilaykan-nushoor.
Translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning, by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is our return.
Description: A supplication to start the day with the remembrance of Allah.

Title: Dua Before Sleeping
Arabic: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
Transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya.
Translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.
Description: A supplication to recite before going to bed.

Title: Dua Before Sleeping
Arabic: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
Transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya.

Description: A supplication to recite before going to bed.

Title: Seeking Comfort
Arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن
Transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan.
Translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief.
Description: A dua to seek relief from sadness and worry.

Title: Calm the Heart
Arabic: اللهم اجعل لي من كل هم فرجًا ومن كل ضيق مخرجًا
Transliteration: Allahumma aj‘al li min kulli hammin farajan wa min kulli dayqin makhrajan.
Translation: O Allah, grant me relief from every worry and an escape from every distress.
Description: A supplication to ask Allah for peace in times of distress.

Transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahya.
Translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.
Description: A supplication to recite before going to bed.

Title: Morning Supplication
Arabic: اللهم بك أصبحنا وبك أمسينا وبك نحيا وبك نموت وإليك المصير
Transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna, wa bika amsaina, wa bika nahya, wa bika namoot, wa ilaykan-nushoor.
Translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning, by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is our return.
Description: A supplication to start the day with the remembrance of Allah.

Translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.
